forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
